channel.title: CVE Feed for Automattic -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automattic -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34766|2024-06-03T11:37:42.882Z -- Automattic -- ChaosTheory
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Automattic ChaosTheory allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ChaosTheory: from n/a through 1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-34549|2024-05-09T12:12:21.870Z -- Automattic -- WP Job Manager
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Automattic WP Job Manager.This issue affects WP Job Manager: from n/a through 2.2.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-22155|2024-04-07T17:56:05.844Z -- Automattic -- WooCommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Automattic WooCommerce.This issue affects WooCommerce: from n/a through 8.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-4392|2024-05-14T08:32:31.906Z -- automattic -- Jetpack – WP Security, Backup, Speed, & Growth
item.description: The Jetpack – WP Security, Backup, Speed, & Growth plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's wpvideo shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 13.3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
